name: Plunder The Present
description:
Plunder The Present is a metroidvania/platformer. Our pirate, traveling through modern day cities, is on a hunt to collect the fuel to power his ship on the journey to Pirate Cove. Explore the skyscapers of Wendy City, the canals of Waterway, and the streets of Crayola City in the hunt for treasure and fuel.

This project was developed by the members of the ISU Game Development Club in the Spring of 2021. For more information on how to get involved with the club, reference the contact information on the following page: https://redbirdlife.illinoisstate.edu/organization/gdc
